api/KS.ConsoleBase.ConsoleChecker.html.title: Class ConsoleChecker | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/KS.ConsoleBase.ConsoleChecker.html.keywords: Class ConsoleChecker Console sanity checking module Inheritance System.Object ConsoleChecker Namespace : KS.ConsoleBase Assembly : Nitrocid.dll Syntax public static class ConsoleChecker : object Methods CheckConsole() Checks the running console for sanity, like the incompatible consoles, insane console types, etc. The severity of the checks can be described in two categories: Error: We'll throw KernelException with type InsaneConsoleDetected when we detect that the console is not conforming to the standards. Warning: We'll just issue a warning in yellow text using the plain 16-color writer when we detect that the console is not supporting optional features, like 256-colors. Declaration public static void CheckConsole() IsConsole256Colors() Does the console support 256 colors? Always true on Windows Declaration public static bool IsConsole256Colors() Returns Type Description System.Boolean

api/KS.Kernel.Exceptions.KernelException.title: Enum KernelExceptionType | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/KS.Kernel.Exceptions.KernelException.keywords: Enum KernelExceptionType Kernel exception types Namespace : KS.Kernel.Exceptions Assembly : Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum KernelExceptionType : int Fields Name Description AliasAlreadyExists The specified alias already exists. Make sure that you select a different alias. AliasInvalidOperation The alias system encountered an invalid operation trying to process your request. AliasNoSuchAlias The specified alias isn't found. AliasNoSuchCommand The specified command isn't found to alias to. AliasNoSuchType The specified alias type isn't found. Archive An invalid archive operation is being performed. AssertionFailure An assertion failure has been detected in the kernel! This is most likely a bug in the kernel module that should be fixed on our end. Color An error occurred while trying to process the color request. Common mistakes include specifying the wrong color specifier. Config A kernel configuration error occurred. ConsoleReadTimeout User didn't provide any input in a timely fashion. Contacts A contacts manager error occurred when trying to perform the requested operation. Make sure that the contact file exists in the correct folder and that it's a valid vCard 2.1, 3.0, or 4.0 contact file. Debug An invalid debugging operation is being performed. Encryption An invalid encryption operation is being performed. Filesystem A general filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. FTPFilesystem A general FTP filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. FTPNetwork A general FTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. FTPShell A general FTP shell error occurred. GroupManagement A group management error occurred. HexEditor An invalid hex editor operation is being performed. Hostname Hostname error. HTTPShell A general HTTP shell error occurred. InsaneConsoleDetected Insane console has been detected. Nitrocid KS can't continue running, because your console is incompatible with our requirements. InvalidFeed Invalid RSS feed. InvalidFeedLink Invalid RSS feed link. InvalidFeedType Invalid RSS feed type. InvalidHash Invalid hash sum. Check to make sure that you copied and pasted the hash sum correctly. If you're using a custom hash sum driver, check to make sure that the driver is loaded and that it works as expected. InvalidHashAlgorithm Invalid hash algorithm. If you're using a custom hash sum driver, check to make sure that the driver is loaded. InvalidKernelPath Invalid kernel path. InvalidManpage Invalid manual page. Check to make sure that the mod containing the valid manual pages is loaded. InvalidMod Invalid mod. If your mod is a valid .NET assembly, check to make sure that it actually implements the interface that is necessary to start the mod. InvalidPath Invalid filesystem path. Check to make sure that it's written correctly. InvalidPlaceholder Invalid placeholder. Consult the kernel documentation for more information. JsonEditor An invalid JSON editor operation is being performed. LanguageInstall The custom language failed to install. Check to make sure that the language file is correctly formed. Usually, the locale generator does a good job in making the localization information for your custom language. LanguageParse The custom language failed to load. Check to make sure that the language file is correctly formed. Usually, the locale generator does a good job in making the localization information for your custom language. LanguageUninstall The custom language failed to uninstall. Mail The mail system encountered an error. ModInstall The mod failed to install. Check to make sure that it's a valid mod file. If your mod is a valid .NET assembly, check to make sure that it actually implements the interface that is necessary to start the mod. ModNoParts The mod contains no parts. Consult with the mod vendor for a new copy. ModUninstall The mod uninstallation has failed. MOTD An error occurred trying to read or set the message of the day. Network A general network error occurred. Should you be trying to connect to a remote end, make sure that you're connected to the Internet or to your local network. NetworkOffline Your network needs to be online before being able to perform operations related to networking. Connect your network adapter and try again. NoSuchDriver Driver doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the driver name correctly, and that the driver is registered properly. NoSuchEvent There is no event by this name. NoSuchLanguage There is no language by this name. NoSuchMailDirectory There is no mail directory by this name. NoSuchMod There is no mod by this name. NoSuchReflectionProperty There is no reflection property by this name. NoSuchReflectionVariable There is no reflection variable by this name. NoSuchScreensaver There is no screensaver by this name. NoSuchShellPreset There is no shell preset by this name. NoSuchTheme There is no theme by this name. NoSuchUser User doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the user correctly. NotImplementedYet This function or feature is not implemented yet. NullUsers There are zero users in the entire kernel. We've reached an extremely rare situation. The kernel can't continue. OldModDetected When the kernel tried to load the specified mod, it requested loading "Kernel Simulator". Since the main application is renamed to Nitrocid KS, this mod can't be run safely. We advice you to upgrade the mod. PermissionDenied Permission denied trying to perform an operation. PermissionManagement An error occurred trying to manage permissions RegularExpression A regular expression error happened while the text is being processed. Check your regular expression syntax and try again. If the time-out occurred, ensure that you don't recurse too much (don't be greedy). RemoteDebugDeviceAlreadyExists The remote debug device already exists. RemoteDebugDeviceNotFound The remote debug device is not found. Check to make sure that you've written an IP address of the device right. RemoteDebugDeviceOperation The remote debug device operation failed. RemoteProcedure An operation was attempted on the remote procedure system that is invalid. RSSNetwork The RSS network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. RSSShell The RSS shell error occurred. ScreensaverManagement The screensaver management error occurred during the operation. SFTPFilesystem A general SFTP filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. SFTPNetwork A general SFTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. SFTPShell A general SFTP shell error occurred. ShellOperation An invalid shell operation is being attempted. TextEditor An invalid text editor operation is being performed. ThreadNotReadyYet The thread is not ready yet. The user code might have forgotten to regenerate the kernel thread after stopping it manually. ThreadOperation A thread operation is invalid in the current state. Refer to the additional message the kernel manager gave you for additional information. UESHConditionParse Condition parsing failed. Please check your syntax to meet the operator's expected design. UESHScript An error occurred while trying to parse the UESH script file. Check your script file for errors and correct them. Unknown Unknown kernel error. UnsupportedConsole An unsupported console has been detected. UserCreation A user creation error occurred. UserManagement A user management error occurred.

index.html.title: What is Nitrocid KS? | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
index.html.keywords: What is Nitrocid KS? Nitrocid KS is an application which simulates our future-planned kernel as we've imagined it. It has all the usual applications, including filesystem manipulation, kernel mods, basic scripting, and many more awesome features. What is this web page? This webpage is not a wiki for the general use of Nitrocid KS; it's an API documentation for mod developers to be used as reference. It constantly gets updated as we push the updates to the main and servicing versions of Nitrocid KS. If you still intend to use a documentation specific to your preferred version of KS, you may refer to the releases page of the project and download the attached 0.0.x.y-doc.rar file. To get started using the documentation, select API Documentation from the top menu and select a namespace to get a clear overview of the API that Nitrocid KS provides. Feedback If you wish to leave feedback to us about this API reference website, use the issue tracker of the project. If you wish to contribute to the documentation of the API, go to the Nitrocid KS source code and make your improvements there on a draft Pull Request ; we don't support override files that are made by clicking on Improve this doc . Any meaningful contributions are welcome. Copyright (c) 2018 - 2023 Aptivi. All rights reserved.
